Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (rSOCs) are highly efficient devices, which allow either the generation of electric power or the storage of energy via fuel production.
Titulo: Dynamic Modeling of Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In this paper, the characteristics of the mode switch are investigated by applying a dynamic 3D stack model.
Titulo: Dynamic Modeling of Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The responses of temperature, current density, and species mole fractions regarding a switch from storage (SOEC) to generation mode (SOFC) are examined in detail.
Titulo: Dynamic Modeling of Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Additionally, the impact of using excess air and continuous voltage variations to limit temperature gradients and fluctuations during the mode switch are analyzed.
Titulo: Dynamic Modeling of Reversible Solid Oxide Cells
